Html:
I was able to convert the Prism Silverlight projects under SL2 but when I built a new beta development box and did a fresh install I am unable to load Prism Silverlight projects using VS2010, SL3 under Windows 7 (Build 7100).    The conversion process acts like it worked (shows the report) but the project never appears - when I attempt to add it again it goes through the conversion again.

Any chance the team can convert and make them available so we can plug them in?   I'm dead in the water on the Silverlight side...

Thanks

Bill

 

VS2010 info follows:

Found a work-around.

The following folder

C:\Program Files (x86)\MSBuild\Microsoft\Silverlight

Will only have a v3.0 subfolder on fresh installs.   I copy/pasted this folder and renamed the copy to v2.0 and VS2010 works as expected (Bug ID: 472162)
